mapper.insert:
insert into word.word_module(module_name, module_image_path, remark, word_path, create_time, status, study_number, superior_module) values
(#{entity.moduleName}, #{entity.moduleImagePath}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.wordPath}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.studyNumber}, #{entity.superiormodule})

insert into word.word_module(module_name, module_image_path, remark, word_path, create_time, status, study_number, superior_module) values
(#{entity.moduleName}, #{entity.moduleImagePath}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.wordPath}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.studyNumber}, #{entity.superiormodule})
on duplicate key update module_name = values(module_name) , module_image_path = values(module_image_path) , remark = values(remark) , word_path = values(word_path) , create_time = values(create_time) , status = values(status) , study_number = values(study_number) , superior_module = values(superior_module)
